title: US-China Trade War Makes Morey’s Hong Kong Tweet Explosive
text: It was the tweet read around the world, when Houston Rockets General Manager Daryl Morey tweeted, “Fight for Freedom. Stand with Hong Kong”. Those seven words sent shockwaves through the NBA and China. Since the tweet several Chinese companies have cut ties with the NBA, sending it into damage control. This week on the News with Rick Sanchez, Rick sat down with Boom Bust co-host Christy Ai to discuss the economic impact of the tweet, how the trade has made it worse and why it caused such an uproar in China. | Just Press Play, hosted by RT America’s Ashlee Banks, has that segment and the best of other in-depth reports, exclusive interviews and controversial issues you may have missed this week on RT America. This episode features highlights from this week’s episodes of PoliticKing, News. Views. Hughes., World According to Jesse, Watching the Hawks, Larry King Now and America’s Lawyer! #JustPressPlay
